column2: Neutics study the same Great Teachers of Ceticism, such as Mohammed, Buddha, Christ, and Hubbard, but reject the Celestial Emperor's spiritual authority. While still based on Elton the Lawgiver's writings, followers hold that later emperors' interpretations are no more valid than any other guru's. Since they interpret the Great Teachers individually, many different readings exist, often contradictory. Although far less organized, the Neutic faith doesn't have to deal with many of the restrictions Cetics face.
ßY*ß! Adherents follow one of four specific Ways (schools of Neutic thought).
The Fellowship of Gurus was one of the predominant associations of Neutic philosophers at the time of the Lawgiver, based upon the pursuit of Freethought and Nirvana.
column3: L'√©cole du sto√Øcisme √©tait l'une des branches pr√©dominantes des philosophies hell√©niques √† l'√©poque de l'ancien Empire romain, fond√©e sur la recherche de la vertu et de la mod√©ration.
column4: Die Schule des Stoizismus war eine der vorherrschenden Zweige der hellenischen Philosophie im alten R√∂mischen Reich, das auf dem Streben nach Tugend und M√§√üigung beruhte.
column6: El estoicismo era una de las ramas predominantes de las filosof√≠as hel√©nicas en la √©poca del antiguo Imperio romano, basado en la b√∫squeda de la virtud y la moderaci√≥n.

column2: The ßYFellowship of Gurusß! is founded.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to restore the Fellowship of Gurus. Based upon the pursuit of enlightenment through freedom of expression, Fellows believe Nirvana is found through the open exchange of ideas.\nOriginally suppressed by the Celestial Emperors, this philosophy has always been closely related to Neuticism.
They shall be a bulwark for enlightened society!
No word is above the Emperor's!
The decision to reinstate a tyrannical personality cult in place of the open interpretation of the Great Teachers has upset many vassals across the Empire.
The decision to reinstate a tyrannical personality cult in place of the open interpretation of the Great Teachers has dragged the newly-reformed Empire into civil war.
As an adherent of the Neutic faith, you are entitled to interpret the writings of the Great Teachers as well as produce original teachings of your own.
Cease the writing of new teachings for now. Though necessary under certain circumstances, this will damage your standing with other Neutics.
This character is inspired to write new Neutic teachings

Lately, you have been having a difficult time writing anything substantial. There are times when it has come easily to you, but now is not one of those times. How can you inspire your fellow Neutics with your teachings if you can't even inspire yourself to put quill to paper?
I will find inspiration in discourse.

Inspiration has struck you! You are swept along with a great wave of ideas, your quill furiously filling pages with insightful teachings as your candles burn down to nubs. In this moment you feel transcendent and enlightened, certain that your words will match those of the Great Teachers. Whether your words stand the test of time remains to be seen, but for now there is no room for doubt... this will be a masterpiece.

You have produced entiely average writings. The prose is simple and careful, guiding willing minds towards enlightenment. While it's possible that there are nuggets of real wisdom scattered throughout the teachings, it's not clear that this particular work will stand out amongst your fellow Neutics.

You thought your latest teachings would be well received, but there are whispers in your court that suggest otherwise. Your courtiers cast pitying glances at you, and you overheard a conversion attempting to determine whether you are a fool or a madman.\n\nYour poor writing has severely damaged your standing as a guru and shamed your dynasty. Already there is rumbling that you have damaged the integrity of the Neutic faith in its entirety.
This was just a temporary lapse.
Call for learned gurus to enlighten you.
I am more enlightened than any of them!
There will be unrest among your subjects!\n

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has offered a new interpretation of great teachings. Those who have read it claim that the writings are insightful and enlightening, delving deep into the heart of long-standing theological and philosophical questions. Gurus are already incorporating it into their own teachings.
This guru walks the true Neutic path!
Bah! Nothing new under the sun.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has written a new set of teachings. Those who have read it claim that the writings are incoherent and vacant, failing to inspire enlightenment and revealing [From.GetTitledFirstName] to be either a fool or a madman.
This guru walks a false path!
You choose a new Neutic Way.\n
The Way of the Cowl attracts ruthless and ambitious adherents, who desire practical methods for acquiring and consolidating power. Revered gurus of the Way include Hubbard and Stanford.
The Way of the Fist attracts aggressive and warlike adherents, who love battle and wish to spread the faith at the tip of the sword. Revered gurus of the Way include the First Emperor and Mohammed.
The Way of the Book attracts diligent and introspective adherents, who seek enlightenment in this life and the next. Revered gurus of the Way include Buddha, Sagan, and Hawking.
The Way of the Dove attracts just and honorable adherents, who desire peace and prosperity in their realms and beyond. Revered gurus of the Way include Christ and Muir.
You have come to a crossroad of faith. You need not follow the Neutic Way of your childhood, there are other paths you could choose... other gurus whose writings you could study.
I will continue on this path.
The vast amount of Neutic writings now available to you is overwhelming. To attain any true level of expertise, you should dedicate your studies to one of the four Ways.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to restore the Fellowship of Gurus. Based upon the pursuit of enlightenment through freedom of expression, Fellows believe Nirvana is found through the open exchange of ideas.\nOriginally suppressed by the Celestial Emperors, this philosophy has always been closely related to Neuticism.
They shall be a bulwark for enlightened society!
No word is above the Emperor's!

The fall of California has spread panic and confusion to the courts of all the Cetic faithful, including your own. Without the Celestial Emperor's spiritual leadership, there is no one to properly interpret the writings of the Great Teachers.\nYour Court Guru has urged you to stay faithful and work toward the restoration of the Celestial Empire, but this could be an opportunity to break free from the Imperial mandate once and for all. After all, what could a pampered prince in Sacramento teach that a wise old sage in your own demesne can't?
Perhaps these Neutics are onto something.
Nonsense! The Emperor will be restored!

I have reunited California, a feat worthy of immortal glory, yet now doubts beset my mind. How can I ensure that this Empire will not fall like it did in the past? When looking for the causes that fragmented and destroyed the old Empire, there is only one thing that appears to be constant...
column3: J'ai r√©tabli l'empire, un exploit digne de gloire √©ternelle, mais maintenant les doutes assaillent mon esprit. Comment puis-je m'assurer que cet Empire ne s'effondrera pas comme par le pass√©†? En cherchant les causes qui ont fragment√© et d√©truit l'ancien empire, il n'y a qu'une seule chose qui semble constante...
column4: Ich habe das Reich wiederhergestellt. Wahrlich eine Leistung, die unsterblichen Ruhm verdient. Jetzt jedoch vernebeln Zweifel meine Gedanken. Wie kann ich sicherstellen, dass dieses Reich nicht wie das vorherige fallen wird? Wenn man nach den Ursachen sucht, die das alte Reich zersplittert und zerst√∂rt haben, scheint nur eines konstant zu sein...

column2: Losing control of the faith led us to our fall...
Work to reinstate the ßYCeticß! faith with yourself at the head in the hopes that it will strengthen the Empire.
Weak and unenlightened leaders doomed us.

Could it be possible that, by embracing the leaderless heresy of Neuticism, my own family weakened the Empire, and that, conversely, I might be able to strengthen it by reintroducing reverence for the Celestial Emperor? My decision could just as easily doom the Empire a second time as I attempt to save it...
I must act quickly, when people still praise me for reuniting California!

Declare yourself the Celestial Emperor and head of the Cetic faith.\nSend letters to all your ßYVassalsß!, ordering them to follow you in your conversion.\nSeize all old ßYCeticß! holy sites under your control so that new temples can be established within them.

[Root.GetTitledName],
We have come to the conclusion that Our predecessors' attachment to the anarchic cult of Neuticism is inextricably tied to the fall of this great Empire of ours, and we have come to the resolution that, in order to truly restore the glory of California, we must also restore its reverence for its Celestial Leader.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]
I must bow to the Imperial will.

I shall not be part of this farce. I am a ßY[From.Religion.GetName]ß!, and I will not abandon my faith in [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

I am happy to stand right beside you for the resurgence of the ßYCeticß! faith, my [Root.GetTitle].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
I have come to the conclusion to abide by the new Imperial decree and convert to the Cetic faith. I expect all my subordinates to follow me in this decision.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
Je respecte le nouveau d√©cret imp√©rial et me convertis √† la foi hell√©nique. Je m'attends √† ce que tous mes vassaux me suivent dans cette d√©cision.

[Root.GetTitledName],
Ich bin zu dem Schluss gekommen, mich an das kaiserliche Dekret zu halten und zum hellenischen Glauben zu konvertieren. Ich erwarte von allen meinen Untergebenen, dass sie mir bei dieser Entscheidung folgen.

Hochachtungsvoll,

column2: The time has come!\nAll the followers of the One True God suffering under the yoke of our mad [scoped_cetic_emperor.GetTitle] have reunited under my lead and are ready to bring the blasphemous tyrant to justice.

Several indignant vassals have banded together to stand against the new Imperial religion of California. They have taken arms and plan to overthrow their own [scoped_cetic_emperor.GetTitle] and restore freedom of interpretation throughout the Empire.
I cannot say I am surprised...

column2: Despite the incredible unpopularity of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] decision, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to emerge victorious from the Celestial Empire's recent civil war and reaffirm [FromFrom.GetHerHis] desire to restore the Cetic faith to the Californian world. After [FromFrom.GetHerHis] show of force and lucidity, the Celestial Emperor has gained several new supporters, both amongst the people as well as the nobility. \n\nThis is truly a new beginning for California and a dark day for Neutics everywhere.

column2: The Civil War has ended, and [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] has reaffirmed [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] authority as our rightful [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]. Perhaps it is time I reconsidered my choice and embraced Ceticism, lest I suffer the [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]'s wrath.
Deep down I always believed in [cetic.GetHighGodName]!
No, I must stand my ground!
Convert to ßYCeticismß! and urge your ßYVassalsß! to do the same.

Even while forced to utter his praises, followers of Neuticism know that the Celestial Emperor is no more an arbiter of wisdom than any other man. Working in the name of truth and enlightenment, they prepare for the day they do not have to hide in caves and grottos to discuss their personal interpretations of the Great Teachers.
The ßYNeuticß! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in ßY[Root.Location.GetName]ß! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

column2: The Neutic Fellowship of Gurus is based on the shunning of religious hierarchy in favor of the free exchange of ideas, centered around the virtues of Wisdom, Openness, Zen, and Freethought. Most members believe that Nirvana can be achieved by studying the Great Teachers and leading a virtuous life.

Members of [neutic.GetName] monasteries are expected to follow a strict set of rules aiming to attain enlightenment through a simple and meditative life. Foreswearing all physical property except the bare necessities.
column3: Les membres des monastËres [neutic.GetName]s sont censÈs suivre un ensemble de rËgles strictes visant ‡ atteindre l'illumination ‡ travers une vie simple et mÈditative. Ils renoncent ainsi ‡ tous les biens matÈriels, hormis le minimum vital.
column4: Von den Mitgliedern [neutic.GetName]er Klˆster wird die Einhaltung strenger Regeln erwartet, die durch ein einfaches und meditatives Leben die Erleuchtung ermˆglichen sollen. column2: The Great Teacher of the Fellowship of Gurus.
You must write new reflections and expand upon the teachings of past gurus. This spiritual duty will help you reflect upon yourself and increase your standing with the order.
To complete this mission, activate the decision ßY'Neutic Writings'ß! in the Intrigue menu and successfully craft competent ings.
